snippet.title: GTA LC01 Lore #4: Six Underground
snippet.description:
In a city filled with shadows, the echoes of the unrestful are still clinging to life, their stories already told and forgotten. In this lore video, Toni Cipriani takes a trip down memory lane and pays homage to his mentor, while the many victims of not only him, but also those of Claude and Mike Braden yearn to be heard.

All clips feature real gameplay from within the Liberty City 2001 Total Conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto 3.
Certain effects and audio have been dramatized for cinematic effect.
Certain scenes are not part of the game, but rather an extension of it for added lore.

Created by Luigi's Club, honouring Rockstar's classic.

https://gtaforums.com/topic/983493-grand-theft-auto-liberty-city-01/

Trailer credits
Editing: Sergiu C. & DoctorMike
Audio Mixing: DoctorMike
Footage: Claudiu_F, Mario J. Reis (Blaue) & Sergiu C.
Writing: Sergiu C.

#gta3 #lc01 #gaming #mafia #gta #grandtheftauto #reaper #underground
